functions.tag: {CustomPotionEffects: [{duration: 0, id: "levitation", amplifier: -128b, show_particles: 1b}, {duration: 0, id: "water_breathing", amplifier: 127b, show_particles: 1b}, {duration: 0, id: "regeneration", amplifier: 127b, show_particles: 0b}, {duration: 600, id: "poison", amplifier: 2b, show_particles: 0b}], HideFlags: 32, Potion: "minecraft:water", display: {Lore: ['{"text":"§7刺さった者の再生能力を消滅させた後、毒を与える。"}'], Name: '{"text":"§e§lイエロープリズム"}'}}
